body: Thank you SO much to our speakers, to our volunteers, to all the delegates, to all our sponsors, to everyone who donated to our scholarship programme...thank you. I am slightly broken, emotionally fragile but my heart is full @ffconf #ffconf
Thank you @rem @Julieanne for inviting me to speak at @ffconf and for looking after us speakers with such love and care I cannot recommend speaking at #ffconf more highly!
@ffconf fantastic day! Diverse interesting talks by some very clever people. Big well done to the #ffconf team who organised it. Left feeling #inspired
Turned out you can organise a diverse conference finding enough women to speak and without having to *teach* women and minorities how to send CFP.#ffconf kudos again for being the best
So happy to see a group of runners going out for our first pre conf run. Thank you @chetbox @mattbee

As usual, I had a fantastic time at @ffconf - I genuinely feel so inspired and most importantly feeling confident. It is always a great way to end the year and look forward to what I can do next. Thank you @Julieanne and @rem gotta write that blog post ASAP.

I’m on the train home after a marvellous time at #ffconf

A good conference like that is such a massive morale boost which I definitely needed.

It was so expertly curated and organised by @Julieanne and @rem.

I’m all conferenced out for this year now, with a full heart.

Had such a great day @ffconf yeaterday, it’s the only conference I’ll sign up to without knowing who will be speaking because I have absolute trust that @rem and @Julieanne will put on an amazing day. Can’t wait for next year!

Attending @ffconf in Brighton on ffriday gave me LIFE. I feel energised by getting to hang out with so many lovely ffriends, and having made a ffew new ones. Such a ffantastic event, I hope it never ends :')
#ffconf was absolutely brilliant. Thanks all!
@rem Last Friday was my first #ffconf - was blown away by the quality and variety of talks. Fantastic achievement from the conf team!
As I head home, Thank you, again to @rem, @Julieanne and the volunteers for @ffconf. Incredible event and I felt incredibly taken care of.
Back home & wondering where to start with all the inspiration I got whilst at #ffconf. Thank you @Julieanne & @rem for an excellent day.
Fantastic set of speakers, interesting and exciting topics, great day at @ffconf. Thanks and congratulations to @rem and @Julieanne!
#ffconf is a wrap: what a truly inspirational event with so many interesting topics. Glad that I finally was able to attend.

Attended #ffconf in 2016 thanks to @rem and @julieanne's scholarship. The inspirational speakers and welcoming community were a big part of giving me the confidence to keep coding, attend bootcamp and become a developer. Cheers guys, hope everyone has a great time @ffconf
Yes! #ffconf was amazing. Had an inspiring day listening to awesome people, taking about super interesting stuff. Almost too good.
must be the most comfy seats of any conference I attended - so glad I finally made it - #fullfrontalconf \m/
Practical, inspiring & progressive - its rare a tech conference delivers on all of them but @ffconf pulls it off. Quality gig

I just had the best day ever at #ffconf

Such a great conference!

Thanks @rem, keep it up

Speaking at #ffconf the last two days has been such a pleasure and a privilege. Thank you so much for building such an inclusive, friendly event and community @rem and @Julieanne! Thank you everyone who came and spoke to me. It means the world to this little ball of anxiety
I had SUCH a great day being geeky at #ffconf. And a great evening decorating cupcakes at @FoodAngels with @yelpbrighton! Best day!

As a web developer I couldn't have asked for anything more. #ffconf you not just talk about diversity and inclusivity you also put them in action. Every topic and speaker were unique and diverse. Thanks for making me a better developer. Hopefully I will make it to next one.

My heart is so full after an amazing #ffconf. Conferences like this wouldn't be possible without passionate organizers like @Julieanne & @rem. Thank you so much for having me and making our web communities better
Almost home after a fantastic day once again at #ffconf. A great atmosphere as usual and another set of inspiring speakers.Thanks to @rem and @Julieanne for putting it all together :)
Had such a fantastic time in Brighton for #ffconf. Huge thanks to @rem & @Julieanne for awarding me a diversity scholarship to attend. So thankful for the opportunity and I learnt so much.
So, #ffconf was awesome. I saw pretty much all the talks twice and I never got bored. I had really interesting conversations at the after parties with people I've never met before.
“be brave enough to be kind” plus more inspiring thoughts — not quite what I expected from my first JS conference, but even better #ffconf
Thank you @Julieanne for accommodating for my 7yo so lovongly at #ffconf, even making him a "grown-up" badge
Not sure how many junios went to #ffconf but I feel honoured to be one of them.Great conference & superb inspiring talks!Bring it on ff2016
Really impressed with the diversity of speakers at #ffconf
All my #ffconf photos are now on Flickr https://www.flickr.com/photos/sebleedelisle/albums/72157673656076087 … congrats to @rem and @Julieanne for pulling it off again!
#ffconf has just, in a single day, changed me as person — we can become good tech friends of so many more people than I had thought! Made possible thanks to dazzling captioning by @whitecoatcapxg
Love @miss_jwo's talk! So many practical tips and advice on how to run inclusive events and spaces. Makes me feel I definitely chose the right industry #ffconf
Thank you #ffconf for going strong for 10 years! We loved being here this week, really happy we could support this conference

Thanks to all the speakers and organisers at #ffconf . It was brilliant, thought provoking hysterically funny at times and a great demonstration of what a lovely community of front end technologists we have.
